name: Christmas Triple Skiing - Run Run Pixcel 2D
name_original: Christmas Triple Skiing - Run Run Pixcel 2D
description:
The addictive mega-hit Christmas Triple Skiing - Run Run Pixcel 2D ! All your friends are playing it - can you beat their high scores?!
You've stolen the cursed idol from the temple, and now you have to run for your life to escape the Christmas Triple Skiing - Run Run Pixcel 2D
nipping at your heels. Test your reflexes as you race down ancient temple walls and along sheer cliffs. Swipe to turn, jump and slide to avoid obstacles, collect coins and buy power ups, unlock new characters, and see how far you can run!

"In every treasure hunting adventure movie there’s one scene in which the plucky hero finally gets his hands on the treasure but then has to navigate a maze of booby traps in order to get out alive. Christmas Triple Skiing - Run Run Pixcel 2D
is this scene and nothing else. And it’s amazing."
